data.title: Gates, Wellcome and Mastercard launch $125 million fund to finance COVID-19 treatments
data.text: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Wellcome, and Mastercard announced a new initiative to accelerate technologies designed to identify, assess, develop, and scale treatments to the COVID-19 epidemic. The COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator will evaluate new and repurposed drugs and biologics to treat patients with COVID-19 in the immediate term, and other viral pathogens in the […]
